spell.name: Flowering
entries: You cause plants in the area to bloom with unnatural speed and beauty. Choose a point within range. All plant life in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point instantly sprouts colorful flowers and thick foliage.
For the duration, the area is difficult terrain for creatures other than you, and the flowers lightly obscure the area. You can dismiss the effect early as a bonus action.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Darkened Flame
entries: A flickering flame appears in your hand, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius. You can throw this flame at a creature within range, dealing fire damage.
The flame can also be used as a light source in dark areas, casting dim light in a 10-foot radius.

spell.name: Ebon Shadow
entries: You summon a dark shadow that takes the form of a smoky tendril and latches onto a target within range. The target is slowed by the shadow’s grip and can’t take reactions.
The shadow lasts for a duration of 1 minute or until the target takes damage.

spell.name: Tidal Surge
entries: You call upon the power of the ocean to send a surge of water towards your enemies. Choose a point within range. The water moves in a 20-foot-long, 10-foot-wide line, pushing creatures along the line.
Creatures caught in the surge must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone and pushed back.

spell.name: Waves of Despair
entries: You conjure waves of dark energy that wash over your enemies. Creatures within a 20-foot radius of the chosen point must make a Wisdom saving throw.
On a failed save, creatures are frightened and take psychic damage. On a successful save, they take half damage and are not frightened.
